thread.title: BREAKING: Claudio Ranieri SACKED: Leicester bin title-winning boss - report
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Claudio Ranieri SACKED: Leicester bin title-winning boss - report

title: BREAKING: Claudio Ranieri SACKED: Leicester bin title-winning boss - report
text:
GETTY Leicester have sacked manager Claudio Ranieri 
Ranieri led Leicester to the Premier League title last season but they've struggled this time around. 
Leicester lie just a point and a place above the relegation zone and only look to be heading one way. 
Mail Online claim Ranieri has paid with his job after the Foxes' dreadful form. Leicester chairman Vichai Srivaddhanaprabha looks angry during Swansea loss Sunday, 12th February 2017 LEICESTER chairman Vichai Srivaddhanaprabha looked pretty angry during Leicester's 2-0 loss to Swansea at Liberty Stadium. 1 / 5 Leicester chairman Vichai Srivaddhanaprabha looks angry during Swansea loss “” 
The decision was made after Leicester's Champions League defeat to Sevilla last night. 
Ranieri's side bagged what could be a vital away goal in a 2-1 defeat. 
But that hasn't been enough for the Foxes man to keep his job. Related videos
